title: How to Make Macaroni with Hot Dogs

steps.headline: Put hotdogs and macaroni separately into the two pots.
The hotdogs may have a 70 % chance of being done before the macaroni, in case that does happen, put the hotdogs on low heat.
When both of them are done, put the hotdogs in a strainer and strain with cold water.
Put back into pot.
steps.description: [This time no water will be in the pot] Add 2 tablespoons milk. Add the seasoning cheese. Stir in 1 tsp butter. Put aside.

steps.headline: Cut the hotdogs into small chunks.
steps.description: You can leave separate or add the hotdogs in the macaroni and cheese.

text: Put hotdogs and macaroni separately into the two pots. Put settings to 'high'. Wait until both boil.  The hotdogs may have a 70 % chance of being done before the macaroni, in case that does happen, put the hotdogs on low heat.  When both of them are done, put the hotdogs in a strainer and strain with cold water. Put aside. Strain macaroni separately.  Put back into pot. [This time no water will be in the pot] Add 2 tablespoons milk. Add the seasoning cheese. Stir in 1 tsp butter. Put aside. Cut the hotdogs into small chunks. You can leave separate or add the hotdogs in the macaroni and cheese. Finished.  Finished.
